properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 08.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED ON 406 MHZ
IN 47-02.93N 018-15.67W AT 212318Z MAY.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO UK COAST GUARD,
PHONE: 4434 4382 0028, 44 344 382 0025,
FAX: 4413 2924 4547,
E-MAIL: UKMRCC@HMCG.GOV.UK.
